name: keratinizing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
changing into, or changing so as to contain, keratin (= a strong natural protein, the main substance that forms hair, nails, horns, feathers, etc.): Keratinizing cells are shown by yellow arrows.
More examplesFewer examplesI was diagnosed with infiltrative keratinizing squamous cell carcinoma. Keratinizing squamous metaplasia of the bladder is rare.Acutely traumatic lesions in the mouth would generally present as an ulcerated lesion, not a thick, white keratinising patch.
